discourse_list.title: Endgame Call 2pm ET/8pm CET: First look at a Scope Framework example

content.content: Today’s call will be the first time we can go over example structure and text of a Scope Framework MIP, which will be the primary mechanism for all mutable governance coordination, processes and parameters in post-Endgame Governance, starting Q2 2023. Link to call: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/89326394914 Recording:

@rune following up on yesterday’s DVC call; with regards to Risk Management for the RWA Scope Frameworks, do you think something similar to the POVE can help when it comes to mitigating RWA risk, and also measuring the Core’s risk tolerance? Example: (courtesy of Deloitte)  Risk Appetite903×296 47.8 KB  Could the RWA Targeting Rules be incorporated into something similar to the POVE? And circling-back to the Constitution, will it include a DAO risk-appetite statement (mission and business strategy, the overall risk philosophy, etc.)?
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
